pageContext.claim: “In our reforms -- and what we've done is, in place of -- one year ago, actually, we estimated that our farmers would have received enough water to support up to 850,000 additional acres of crops...That's a lot of acres. And over 130,000 minimum -- over 130,000 jobs.”
pageContext.analysis: It’s not clear where Trump drew these statistics from. The changes to the water rules don't necessarily equate to more acres of crops. They only loosen how water and chemicals can be used and the restrictions on various watershed.
